name: HELLEN
description:
PITCH

Hellen is an infiltration game in which you play as a scientific, trapped in a space station on a dying planet. Being stealthy is vital, in the corridors and vents, to survive to the alien you've helped to create !

US

We were 3 students to make this project in 5 months. So we would be more than happy to read back what you thinked about the game, and feel free to share it if you like it ! :)

The Team:

- Dimitri Mazy (Character Artist, Lighting, Level Design)

- Emeric Durdos (Programmer, Technical Artist, Level Artist)

- Yoan Vernet (Concept Artist, Environment artist, Animator)

Special Thanks :

- Nathalie (Voice Over Hellen) fiverr.com/ndeahna

- Sean (Voice Over Adam) fiverr.com/seansmithsounds

- Thomas Veauclin, Adrien Forestier, Jérome Prevost, François Giraud, Vincent Chiarotto (pedagogic team)

Controls :

Z - Move Forward

Q - Move to Left

S - Move Back

D - Move to Right

Left Click (Mouse 1) - Interact

Middle Click (Mouse 3) - Use Torchlight

F - Throw Lure / Activate Lure

How To Install :

1| Download it

2| Execute Hellen.exe

3| Enjoy your life !

For Press and Streamers :

If you like Hellen, we encourage you to make videos, such as playthrough or instruction videos. We are fine with publishing these videos to your website or YouTube or similar video sharing services.
If you can just message us with the link of the video, so we can see it and share our work :)
